findings.title: Redundant code
findings.description: The code in if and else block of distributeTax is redundant.

findings.title: The blacklist account still can make transfer
findings.description: As per require check on line 125 the blackListed account still can make the transfer to other non blackListed account or vice versa.

findings.title: setTeamWalletAddress doesn’t update the address correctly
findings.description: The function setTeamWalletAddress fails to update the address as intended.

findings.title: setSlippage doesn’t update the address
findings.description: The setSlippage function does not correctly update the address.
